relevant_communication:
Cedia is in regular contact with EU officials, MEP's, European Agronomic bodies and regularly holds events where key policy makers are in attendance. 
Cedia also represents its member associations at a world level in the World Association of Agronomists and participates in its events globally.
goals__remit: CEDIA is the network for national associations of Agricultural Scientists and Engineers in a number of European Countries. We are committed to cooperation in education, research, advice and development with regard to strategies for sustainable agriculture, food production, environmental protection, food safety, community policy, rural development and professional development.
